meanings.sent1: She principally enjoys reading books in her free time.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was principally due to their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat's antics were principally aimed at getting attention.
meanings.sent4: His speech was principally a call for unity among the community.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the painting were principally what caught her eye.

meanings.sent1: The new law is principally about protecting the environment.
meanings.sent2: His argument was principally based on scientific evidence.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was principally an illusion to deceive the audience.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of the theory is principally rooted in ancient philosophy.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project was principally due to effective communication.
